channel.title: 317~Amazing PK Source [American ~ Rune] DDsspeced Base~317 [ Very MeSsY]
channel.description:
[u][i][b] PLEASE COMMENT IF YOU DOWNLOADED. THANKS :). NO TRAINING NEEDED, STOP ASKING " BUT WHERE DO WE TRAIN AT?"THIS IS A PK SOURCE. IT IS NOT V3 V4 V5 ETC BECAUSE I WONT BE USING ALLSTARS SOURCE ANYMORE. THIS IS DDSSPECED SOURCE. [/b][/i][/u]
[u][b]Includes:[/b][/u]
-So many commands for example ::f2pstrpure ::60defpure ::zerker and a whole lot more! -All teleports are changed to pk hot spots -Working dds, gmaul, whip, d long, saradomin, zammy, bandos, and armadyl special attacks -- already from ddsspeced -Cannot teleport above 20 wilderness -Magic Fully working -- already from ddsspeced -Range Fully working -- already from ddsspeced -American Rune Ddsspeced source client -Melee Fully working -- already from ddsspeced - NO TRAINING BUT ::MONEY gives 10m. prices are raised so there is a little economy. well idk how there is lol. -A LOT MORE! - too lazy to name them so dont ask.
-Thanks
[u][b]PS DONT SAY "oh thats already in the server/source," i am giving credits to Jayden FOR SOURCE/Base.[/b][/u]
Here is some pictures. :D
BE SURE TO DOWNLOAD THE AMERICAN RUNE CLIENT BECAUSE THIS IS DDSSEPECED SOURCE
